hero.subtitle: We design visuals, build websites, and turn data into business impact.

profil.description: Welcome! I'm Reza, a creative professional working with my team to help individuals and businesses communicate more effectively through impactful design and data solutions. Combining visual creativity with technical precision, we transform your ideas into high-quality visuals and smart reports that are both beautiful and functional.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide impactful, authentic, and data-driven creative services designed to help your business grow with purpose and precision.
services.note: Looking for a custom service or collaboration?

branding.title: Branding & Graphic Design
branding.description: From logo creation to full visual identity systems, we craft authentic and memorable brand visuals that resonate with your audience.

web.title: Web & Landing Page Development
web.description: We design and build high-performing, responsive websites and landing pages optimized for both user experience and conversion.

data.title: Business Data & Accounting Solutions
data.description: Transform your raw data into meaningful financial and operational insights. We provide data automation, business reporting, and accounting consulting to help you make smarter decisions.

skills.title: Tools That Power Our Work
skills.description: Discover the creative tools and technologies our team relies on to craft impactful, modern, and visually compelling projects.

contact.title: Contact me for collaboration
contact.description: Reach out today to discuss your project needs and start collaborating on something amazing!
contact.address: Jl. Kuin Selatan, Kec. Banjarmasin Barat, Kota Banjarmasin, Kalimantan Selatan 70123

items.question: What services does rzbar.std provide?
items.answer: We offer creative and data-driven services such as branding, graphic design, web & landing page development, and data analytics reporting.

items.question: Do you work with international clients?
items.answer: Yes! Our team collaborates with clients globally through online communication and project management tools.

items.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
items.answer: Project duration depends on complexity ‚Äî typically between 1 to 4 weeks. We always set clear timelines during consultation.

items.question: Can I request custom solutions?
items.answer: Absolutely. Every project is tailored to your business goals, from visuals to data reporting integrations.
